name: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War + Lord of Skulls DLC
name_original: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War + Lord of Skulls DLC
description:
Included in this pack: Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War
Warhammer 40,000: Gladius – Relics of War brings you to a world of terror and violence. Four factions will engage in a brutal war for dominance over the planet’s resources. In the first turn-based 4X strategy game set in Warhammer 40,000 you will lead one of four unique factions. Warhammer 40,000: Gladius - Relics of War Lord of Skulls
This DLC adds the Lord of Skulls as a new neutral unit roaming the battlefields of Gladius Prime!
The Lord of Skulls is a massive behemoth, one of the strongest units in the game. It will be spawned through an event and will warp in, ready to wreak havoc on anything it sees! Should you manage to defeat it, despite its tremendous strength and firepower, you will receive an amazing reward...
The special promo on Warhammer titles will run until 27th July 2022, 10 PM UTC.
